Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.system

Class SpawnSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.GameSystem
      • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.system.SpawnSystem

  • public class SpawnSystem
extends dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.GameSystem
    Spawns entity clones from spawner entities. 
     Events received:
 Events.SPAWN - spawns a clone using the provided entity's Spawner (Entity)

 Events emitted:
 Events.CREATE - when an entity is spawned (Entity)
